graph

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a Vertex of a Graph.
    See Also:
    Graph

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vertex()
      Create a new vertex without edges.
      Vertex(java.lang.String identifier)
      Create a new vertex without edges.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vertex addEdge(Edge edge)
      Add an edge to the vertex.
      Vertex addVisitedFlag()
      Active the 'visited' flag on the vertex.
      int getDegree()
      Get the degree (number of edges) of the vertex.
      java.util.List<Edge> getEdges()
      Retrieve all edges which are connected to the vertex.
      int getInDegree()
      Get the in-degree (number of edges which go in) of the vertex.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name of the vertex.
      int getOutDegree()
      Get the out-degree (number of edges which go out) of the vertex.
      boolean isVisited()
      Indicate if the 'visited' flag is activated on the vertex.
      Vertex removeEdge(Edge edge)
      Remove an edge from the vertex.
      Vertex removeVisitedFlag()
      Remove the 'visited' flag from the vertex.

      • Vertex

        public Vertex()
        Create a new vertex without edges.

        public Vertex(java.lang.String identifier)
        Create a new vertex without edges.
        Parameters:
        identifier - Name of the vertex.

    • Method Detail

      • getEdges

        public java.util.List<Edge> getEdges()
        Retrieve all edges which are connected to the vertex.
        Returns:
        The list of all edges which are connected to the vertex.

      • addEdge

        public Vertex addEdge(Edge edge)
        Add an edge to the vertex. If the edge is not between this vertex and an other, this function do nothing.
        Parameters:
        edge - The edge to add.
        Returns:
        The modified vertex.

      • removeEdge

        public Vertex removeEdge(Edge edge)
        Remove an edge from the vertex. Do nothing if the edge is not bind to the vertex.
        Parameters:
        edge - The edge to remove.
        Returns:
        The modified vertex.

      • getDegree

        public int getDegree()
        Get the degree (number of edges) of the vertex.
        Returns:
        The degree of the vertex.

      • getInDegree

        public int getInDegree()
        Get the in-degree (number of edges which go in) of the vertex.
        Returns:
        The in-degree of the vertex.

      • getOutDegree

        public int getOutDegree()
        Get the out-degree (number of edges which go out) of the vertex.
        Returns:
        The out-degree of the vertex.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of the vertex.
        Returns:
        The name of the vertex.

      • isVisited

        public boolean isVisited()
        Indicate if the 'visited' flag is activated on the vertex. This flag can be used for graph traversal.
        Returns:
        True if the flag is activated, false either.
        See Also:
        addVisitedFlag(), removeVisitedFlag()

      • addVisitedFlag

        public Vertex addVisitedFlag()
        Active the 'visited' flag on the vertex. This flag can be used for graph traversal.
        Returns:
        The modified vertex.
        See Also:
        isVisited(), removeVisitedFlag()

      • removeVisitedFlag

        public Vertex removeVisitedFlag()
        Remove the 'visited' flag from the vertex. This flag can be used for graph traversal.
        Returns:
        The modified vertex.
        See Also:
        isVisited(), addVisitedFlag()
